Articles.Content: You do know you can edit your posts, right?

Yeah, hit quote instead on accident, fixed now though

BTW, I made an engine texture too to match these stacks:

7 posts to 100!

Yikes, I\'m not even sure what to do with the amount of awesomeness here.
That leg looks fantastic, can\'t wait till it is out with 0.15.Keep up the good work
Nova, are there any updates with the camera?

Nova, are there any updates with the camera?

It might not be doable; there are a lot of fudge factors and tweaks built into the in-game camera to put together the different layers of the game at different distances, and anyone trying to introduce new camera code from scratch faces the problem of integrating all of it themselves.
If im correct, 3 more posts. Nova, you have to post something awesome for 100 pages.
I will selflesly donate another post to Nova\'s awesome thread in the interest of him gaining his well deserved 100 pages. Congrat\'s on this milestone Nova and love your work.
SO CLOSE! GO! GO! MAN THE POSTING STATIONS!
Please stop spamming; it will reach 100 pages just fine with normal posting.

Yeah, enough with the spamming to reach page 100.

Edit: Also, page 100!

Edit2: Now that 0.15 is out, I can finally post this picture!

So things now actually glow when they get hot?

TECHNOLOGY!

Yeah, enough with the spamming to reach page 100.

Edit: Also, page 100!

Edit2: Now that 0.15 is out, I can finally post this picture!

[img width=800 height=316]http://i.imgur.com/Cbeq6.png[/mg]

That looks quite nice.

Sorry if this has been asked already, but do you have a planned release date?
Me gusta.
Oh wow, that looks great! Is it going to be that fast in the game? Anything deploying itself so fast in space would be a bit... scary.

Oh wow, that looks great! Is it going to be that fast in the game? Anything deploying itself so fast in space would be a bit... scary.

Probably not. I could likely vary the speed via a plugin, too.

That riveting looks amazing! And I love the springy animation on those solar panels.

If I may though, I think you should make the adapters a brighter color. Like the orange color of what I\'m assuming are engine fairing panels. Like a \'50\'s-\'60\'s test craft:
The adapters are just copy/pasted from SE2, I haven\'t redone them yet. But yeah, I think that color suits them!
Wow, that animation looks great, can\'t wait till it\'s out.I hope it will be during the next few weeks ???
Also, regarding a release date, I really don\'t know. I need to remake pretty much every part, and there were quite a few...but, I\'m not ruling out earlier, smaller releases.

Also, regarding a release date, I really don\'t know. I need to remake pretty much every part, and there were quite a few...but, I\'m not ruling out earlier, smaller releases.

Looks nice, but I would suggest having the small combustion chambers and tanks on the engine start glowing at higher heat levels too, so it looks more like it\'s about to explode, and not just melt.
Holy shit, reentry heat! Also, the next post you make will be your 3000th, make it count!

Holy shit, reentry heat! Also, the next post you make will be your 3000th, make it count!

That looks like a fairing panel, not heat. Could be wrong.
